memberdef.name: BindVectorField

param.type: Real(*)(const Real &xx, const Real &yy, const Real &zz)
Real(*)(const Real &xx, const Real &yy, const Real &zz)
Real(*)(const Real &xx, const Real &yy, const Real &zz)

briefdescription.para: Binds a given vector field to the grid.

detaileddescription.para: We assume the field to be of the form: \[ \mathbf{v}(\mathbf{x}) = p(x, y, z)\hat{\mathbf{i}} + q(x, y, z)\hat{\mathbf{j}} + r(x, y, z)\hat{\mathbf{k}} \]

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the function implementing the $ p $ component of the vector field.
Pointer to the function implementing the $ q $ component of the vector field.
Pointer to the function implementing the $ r $ component of the vector field.

briefdescription.para: Binds a given component of a vector field to the grid.

detaileddescription.para: We assume the field to be of the form: \[ \mathbf{v}(\mathbf{x}) = p(x, y, z)\hat{\mathbf{i}} + q(x, y, z)\hat{\mathbf{j}} + r(x, y, z)\hat{\mathbf{k}} \]

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the function implementing the $ p $ component of the vector field.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the function implementing the $ q $ component of the vector field.
